home.content1: NEROは、ユーザー体験の向上、エコシステムの促進、およびバリデータの安定性に焦点を当てたモジュール式のブロックチェーンです。私たちは、NEROの3層アーキテクチャと、ユーザーを中心とした設計、持続可能なトークノミクス、および効率的な教育プログラムについて解説しています。NEROはブロックチェーン上のアプリケーションやユーザーが直面する課題に効率的かつ安全な基盤を提供し、効果的な対応を可能にします。
home.title2: 3層モジュール式のブロックチェーン
home.content2: NEROの3層モジュール式のEVM互換性のあるブロックチェーンアーキテクチャは、他に特化したモジュラーブロックチェーンに作業を分担することによって、より効率的かつ拡張性のあるシステムを実現しています。
home.content2-1-2: トランザクションの処理
home.content2-3-2: データの実用性を担保する
home.content2-4-2: トランザクションの順序付け
home.title3: 持続可能なトークノミクス「CYOG」
home.content3:
「CYOG」とは「Choose your own gas」の省略であり、ユーザーにとって便利なガスを選択できるとのことを意味します。
NEROでは、プラットフォームトークンを用いるガス代の支払いが可能となリます。
これらの需要を生み出すことによって、より持続可能で安定したエコシステムを育成します。
home.title4: 新規ユーザー向けにガス代を提供
home.content4: ユーザーの加入を促進し、参入障壁を取り除くために、NEROは新規ユーザーの最初の数回のトランザクションのガス代を支援するよう、アカウント抽象化であるPaymasterメカニズムを活用しています。これにより、新規ユーザーが初期コストなしでプラットフォームを利用することができます。さらに、新しいプロジェクトでは、利用の増加と引き換えに他人の取引手数料を支援することもできます。
home.title5:
アカウント
抽象化
＆
ソーシャル
アカウント
ログイン
home.content5:
ネロがアカウント抽象化を活用することで、ユー
ザーは既存のソーシャルアカウントを使用してロ
グインすることができ、ブロックチェーン専用ア
カウントを作成する必要がなくなり、オンボー
ディングプロセスが簡素化になります。 プラグ
インや拡張ウォレットのインストールは必要あり
ません。
home.title6: ユーザー権限と設定の柔軟性
home.content6: NEROは、ユーザーに対して明確かつ分かりやすいトランザクションメッセージを提供しています。ブロックチェーン技術に詳しくない方々にとっても、よりアクセスしやすいプラットフォームを構築しています。分かりやすいトランザクションメッセージは、トランザクション詳細の高い透明性を提供することで、ユーザーが潜在的な詐欺に巻き込まれることを防ぎます。

main.subTitle: The Odyssey
main.content: Taiwan Builder House (TBH) 是一個匯集了各種 Web3 元素的創新社群。在這裡，你不僅可以認識來自不同領域的創建者，還可以找到志同道合的夥伴。通過 Taiwan Builder House，你將有機會在Web3 領域中開創出自己獨特的道路。

timeLine.content1:
請填寫 TBH 報名表格，並透過報名確認郵件中的邀請，加入 TBH 的工作區，以進行比賽協調以及相關的溝通和更新。

參與者可以以專案或尋找團隊的個人身分註冊，但只有專案才有資格被列入入圍團隊。尋找團隊的個人可以在組建或加入團隊後，更新他們現有的註冊或創建新的團隊註冊。

選擇心儀題目，並根據要求於 12 月 8 日前繳交初始提案，提案模式可以是 Deck、Prototype、MVP。
timeLine.content2:
選擇導師出題之團隊，越早投稿將可享有越完整的導師時間，若無心儀題目亦可直接投稿。 TBH 的評審委員會根據預設的評分標準，從已註冊的專案中選出。

專案將根據多項標準進行評估，包括概念、技術實施、產品設計、創新使用特性等。
timeLine.content3:
入圍的團隊需親自參加 TBH 的展示日。

每個團隊將被給予 10 - 15 分鐘的展示時間。團隊可以自由分配時間，但建議留出五分鐘供評審團提問。

結果將在線上和親自展示環節結束後的同一天公布。

overView.title: OVERVIEW
overView.subTitle: 總覽
overView.content1: 通過提交優秀的項目來展現自己的技術才華和創新思維。如果項目在活動中獲得了好評，並且被認為有潛力，Hacker 將可以獲得獎金和孵化的機會，以進一步發展並完善項目。
overView.subTitle1: 提交項目展現技術和創新思維，爭取 VC 及頂級 Mentor協助。
overView.F1-1: 參賽項目需未完成 Seed Round 融資。
overView.F1-2: Hacker 需自行組成隊伍參賽。
overView.F1-3: Hacker 需加入 Telegram 群組，已獲得最新消息。
overView.F2-1: Hacker 無需在活動開始後才開始開發，但最晚必須在 8/25 前提交作品。
overView.F2-2: 越早選擇題目並提交提案將越有獲得與導師交流的機會，若超出比賽時間提案概不受理。
overView.F2-3: Hacker 可以使用任何開源程式碼或公開可用的 API，但必須在提交作品時，明確列出其使用的所有外部資源並對其使用途徑做出說明。
overView.F2-4: 作品需為原創，不得抄襲他人作品。
overView.F3-1: 創新性：作品是否具有創新思維和解決問題的新方法。
overView.F3-2: 技術實現：作品在技術層面的完成度及難易度。
overView.F3-3: 實用性：作品是否能夠解決實際問題，或者有實際應用的價值和潛力轉化為實際產品或服務。
overView.F3-4: 用戶體驗：作品在設計和用戶體驗方面的表現。
overView.F4-1: Hunter 建議優先選擇 Bounty 題目，以獲得Bounty 以及 Mentor 資源。若作品無題目匹配仍可報名，將直接進入大會評選環節。
overView.F4-2: Hunter 需在規定的時間內提交作品，超時將無法接受。
overView.F4-3: 作品提交需包含完整的源碼、使用說明及簡短的開發報告，報告需要說明該作品如何解決問題以及其創新點。
overView.F5-1: 參賽作品的版權屬於開發者，但 TBH 有權在非商業目的下分享和展示這些作品，以及在活動宣傳中引用這些作品。
overView.F5-2: 如果參賽作品涉及侵犯他人版權，由開發者自行負責。
overView.content2: 包含但不限於交易工具、量化策略或高頻策略等。TBH 將提供交易比賽、量化交易工作坊、交易相關題目等機會。如果 Trader 的策略被認為具有實現價值，參賽者可以獲得獎金以及更多合作機會。
overView.subTitle2: 激盪良好策略，發展交易潛能，獲得高額賞金及合作機會。
overView.S1-1: Trader 需對金融市場和交易策略有基本的理解
overView.S1-2: Trader 可以以個人身分或是以隊伍形式參賽。
overView.S2-1: 參加者無需在活動開始後才開始開發交易策略，但需在 8/25 前提交完整的策略及其回測結果。請確保所有策略和結果都清晰明瞭，方便評審了解和評價。
overView.S2-2: 參加者可以使用任何開源程式碼或公開可用的 API，但必須在提交作品時，明確列出其使用的所有外部資源並對其使用途徑做出說明。
overView.S2-3: 參加者可以使用任何開源程式碼或公開可用的金融數據 API。
overView.S3-1: 策略創新：策略是否具有創新的想法和方法。
overView.S3-2: 風險控制：策略是否有考慮到風險控制和抗市場波動的能力。
overView.S4-1: 參加者需在規定時間內提交策略，超時將無法接受。
overView.S4-2: 策略提交需包含策略說明及詳細的回測報告。
overView.content3: Gem Hunters 是社群基石，必須透過尋找和收集 "寶石"（或許是活動中的線索，NFT或其他象徵物）來完成挑戰和任務。Hunter 搜集一定數量的寶石，可以獲得大會的特殊權益。
overView.subTitle3: 搜集項目任務寶石，兌換NFT，擁有大會頂級權益
overView.T1-1: 參加者必須在活動開始前註冊並加入 Gem Hunter Group。
overView.T1-2: Hunter 必須完整提交所需地址。
overView.T2-1: 完成20%蒐集進度：TBH2023 SilveryNFT 、 Silvery Prize。
overView.T2-2: 完成50%蒐集進度：TBH2023 GoldenNFT 、 Golden Prize。
overView.T2-3: 完成100%蒐集進度：獲得After Party門票、TBH2023 DiamondNFT 、Diamond Prize。
overView.T3-1: Hunter 必須遵守活動規則並按照指定的挑戰和任務蒐集寶石。
overView.T3-2: 完成任務獲得的寶石數量依任務難度和要求有所不同。
overView.T3-3: 若發現任何試圖作弊或違規行為，組織方有權取消該參加者的所有權益並移出Gem Hunter Group。
overView.T3-4: Hunter 需使用同一個地址進行任務，若因為地址提供不正確，以致無法驗證是否完成任務，將視為未完成。
overView.T3-5: 若Hunter 無法到場導致於法獲得部分權益，TBH 將不進行任何替代補償。
overView.T4-1: 活動日期、任務與獎品內容可能會有所變動，請密切關注 Gem Hunter Group 的公告。
overView.T4-2: Hunter 需確保聯絡方式準確無誤，及若不克到場導致無法獲得部分權益，TBH 將不進行任何替代補償。
overView.T4-3: 若發現任何試圖作弊或違規行為，組織方有權取消該參加者的所有權益並移出Gem Hunter Group。

prize.title: Prize
prize.subTitle: 獎金
prize.pf: 一等獎 : 3,000U, Onekey mini * 1, $1000 Google Cloud 額度 + Technical mentorship
prize.ps: 二等獎 : 2,000U, $1000 Google Cloud 額度 + Technical mentorship
prize.pt: 三等獎 : 1,000U, $1000 Google Cloud 額度 + Technical mentorship
prize.pf1: 一等獎 : 1,500U, Onekey mini * 1, $500 Google Cloud 額度 + Technical mentorship
prize.ps1: 二等獎 : 1,000U, $500 Google Cloud 額度 + Technical mentorship
prize.pt1: 三等獎 : 500U, $500 Google Cloud 額度 + Technical mentorship
prize.1T: 評審團將選出整體最佳項目
prize.1S: 整體最佳獎與最具潛力項目只可擇一獲得
prize.2T: 評審團將選出最具潛力項目
prize.2S: 整體最佳獎與最具潛力項目只可擇一獲得
prize.TZ: 1. AI 與 Blockchain 的結合，方法不限
prize.LCT: 針對市場波動進行預測分析
prize.LCC: 『波動』，是金融市場中即具重要的一個元素，波動產生的套利空間使套利者願意承擔風險進行套利。相較於傳統金融，加密貨幣市場便具有波動大風險高的特性，即便如此，高風險所伴隨的高報酬仍然吸引眾多交易者進入市場進行交易。
prize.LC1T: 1. 針對市場波動進行預測分析，方法不限
prize.LC1C1: 若以『時間』作為採樣標準，請預測 3000ms 後市場狀態
prize.LC1C2: 若以『交易』作為採樣標準，請預測 300 ticks 後市場狀態
prize.LC1C3: 將依照准確度作為評分標準
prize.LC2T: 2. 請使用分析結果建構一交易模型，回測結果須考慮手續費、滑價、成交與否等因素
prize.Bonki: $BONK 是一種文化代幣，結合了 web3 文化的幽默和功能性。它與130個多條鏈上的 DeFi、遊戲和 NFT 項目合作，並在全球50多個交易所進行交易。
prize.Bonkt1: 設計一個扭蛋機制，讓使用者可以花費一定數量的輸入貨幣（Solana 代幣或 NFT），以概率方式獲得獎勵。
prize.WHT: 利用 Wormhole 實現跨鏈功能的創新應用開發競賽
prize.WHC: 獎金將根據參賽團隊提出的創新程度、實用性、用戶體驗和技術實施等各方面的優秀性來分配。每個獎金級別的獲得者將由專業評審團決定。
prize.WH1T: 1. 應用必須利用 Wormhole 實現跨鏈功能，並能在多個區塊鏈生態系統中運作。
prize.WH2T: 2. 應用可以是DeFi、NFT、遊戲或其他領域的應用，但必須具有實際的用途和潛在的市場價值。
prize.WH3T: 3. 應用的設計和實現必須優秀，包括但不限於用戶體驗、性能和安全性。
prize.WH4T: 4. 應用必須有完整的文檔和代碼註釋，以便評委和社區成員理解和評估。
prize.FCT:
使用 Filecoin 和 IPFS 創建創新的去中心化應用
包括各種領域，如媒體共享、社交媒體、去中心化金融（DeFi）等
prize.FCC: 獎金將根據參賽團隊提出的創新程度、實用性、用戶體驗和技術實施等各方面的優秀性來分配。每個獎金級別的獲得者將由專業評審團決定。
prize.FC1T: 1. 應用必須是全新的，不能是從已存在的應用中簡單地修改或增強。
prize.FC2T: 2. 必須有實際的用途和價值，並且應能夠解釋它如何解決問題。
prize.FC3T: 3. 應用的設計和實現必須優秀，包括但不限於用戶體驗、性能和安全性。
prize.FC4T: 4. 提交的項目必須是開源的，許可證需為 MIT 和 APACHE2。
prize.FC5T: 4. 產品的技術實現必須穩固，並且在黑客松期間必須展示工作的原型或演示。
prize.FCS:
Filecoin 官方文檔和開發者工具：https://docs.filecoin.io/
Filecoin Grants 提案模板和指南：https://github.com/filecoin-project/devgrants
Filecoin 社區和開發者論壇：https://docs.filecoin.io/basics/project-and-community/chat-and-discussion-forums/
Filecoin Dev Grants GitHub 倉庫：https://github.com/filecoin-project/devgrants
IPFS官方文檔：https://docs.ipfs.io/

提案時，你需要包含以下內容：
項目名稱：你的項目或提案的名稱。
項目描述：一個關於你的項目是什麼，它做什麼，以及為什麼它是重要的簡短概述。
團隊信息：你和你的團隊成員的信息，包括你們的技能和經驗，以及你們為什麼適合執行這個項目。
詳細設計：你打算如何實現你的項目的詳細計劃，包括技術細節和你打算使用的工具。
時間表：你打算在多長時間內完成這個項目，包括任何重要的里程碑。
預算和資金用途：你需要多少資金，以及你打算如何使用這些資金。
許可證：你的項目將會在哪種開源許可證下發布。
支持和參與：你打算如何讓社區參與到你的項目中，以及你打算如何支持和維護你的項目。
附加信息：任何你認為評審團需要知道的其他信息。
prize.HVT: 搭建圍繞胖協議（Fat protocol）的創新功能
prize.HVC: Fat Protocol Thesis由Joel Monegro在2016年給出。它提到基礎層區塊鏈增持的價值始終大於其後續應用層。 本質上，基礎層的市值總是會超過建立在同一基礎層上的所有應用程序價值的市值。
prize.HV1T: 請利用頭部協議的可組合性功能，搭建圍繞胖協議（Fat protocol）的創新功能，例如：利用Uniswap的hook機制，引發交易可編程化的想象，圍繞uniswap生態研發，最大益處來自於其強大的流動性深度。
prize.CTT: 當社交進入了 Web3 世界會是什麼？發揮你的創意，提交有趣的 Web3 Social Idea!
prize.CTC: 設計創新且有趣的Web3社交應用，演示產品如何讓用戶透過任何web3技術(錢包登入, 去中心匿名, 激勵機制等....)來實現社交互動的行為，並思考如何使用戶持續性使用。
prize.CT1C1: 使用Web3技術實現平台的運作和激勵機制
prize.CT1C2: 提供有效的激勵方法吸引用戶參與
prize.CT1C3: 設計驗證機制以確保激勵與用戶交互真實性
prize.CT1C4: 以 conpect 或 demo 尤佳演示社交應用場景
prize.CT2C1: 解決方案創新性和技術可行性
prize.ACEC: 在期間內，申請並審核後，將可享有Maker優惠費率
prize.ACE1T: 期間 Maker 成交量滿 10,000,000TWD
prize.ACE2T: 期間 Maker 成交量滿 20,000,000TWD
prize.ACE3C1: 成交量只計算台幣交易對，成交形式為Maker
prize.ACE3C2: 手續費返還將以「週」為單位返還
prize.ACE3C3: Taker將依照原有手續費計算

hunter.title: Prize
hunter.subTitle: 獎金
hunter.1T: 評審團將選出整體最佳項目
hunter.1S: 整體最佳獎與最具潛力項目只可擇一獲得
hunter.2T: 評審團將選出最具潛力項目
hunter.2S: 整體最佳獎與最具潛力項目只可擇一獲得
hunter.MEXC1T: 點選網站連結進行註冊
hunter.MEXC1C1: 前100名註冊每位將額外活得10USDT
hunter.OKX1: 1. 透過builderhouse連結註冊OKX，享有終生20%手續費折扣
hunter.OKX2: 2. 前100名透過builderhouse連結註冊，並完成KYC2進階認證，即可獲得10U合約券
hunter.OKX3: 3. 9/25前完成一次現貨/合約交易，即可獲得20U合約券(限量50人)
hunter.OKX4: 4. 只要透過builderhosue連結註冊，即可參加OKX限量周邊抽獎
hunter.OKX4t: 限量周邊：咖啡組、周邊禮盒套組
hunter.NLS: NONE LAND aims to bring Web3 to a broader audience, reaching beyond blockchain enthusiasts and connecting with everyone.By transforming intricate Web3 topics into entertaining and comprehensible content, NONE LAND has become the most approachable Web3 media brand. Together, let's forge a future of limitless possibilities
hunter.NL1T: 1. 追蹤 NONE LAND Instagram
hunter.NL2T: 2. 訂閱 NONE LAND Youtube

hunter.Zomma1: 1. Make an option trade (buy/sell call or puts) or Add Liquidity into Zomma Pools

FAQ.title: FAQ
FAQ.q1: Q1: 什麼是 Taiwan Builder House?
FAQ.a1: A1: 我們致力於將台灣的社區聚集起來，並提供一個平台讓開發者以及社群可以盡情的展現自己的才華。
FAQ.q2: Q2: 誰可以參加這個活動?
FAQ.a2: A2: 任何人都可以參加，不論你是初學者還是經驗豐富的開發者又或者是社群參與者皆可。
FAQ.q3: Q3: 參加活動需要花費多少?
FAQ.a3: A3: 參加活動完全免費，我們歡迎所有人參加。參與的人將自動成為 Hunter ，一起爭取高額獎金吧！
FAQ.q4: Q4: 我是開發新手，我可以參加嗎?
FAQ.a4: A4: 當然可以，我們鼓勵所有有興趣的人參與這次的活動。
FAQ.q5: Q5: 早期註冊是什麼意思？
FAQ.a5: A5: 早期註冊意味著你可以在活動開始前就已經完成註冊，這樣你將可以早些收到我們的更新和消息。請注意開發者/交易者和社群(獵人)有不同的報名連結。
FAQ.q6: Q6: 我錯過了註冊截止日期，還可以申請嗎?
FAQ.a6: A6: 抱歉，如果你錯過了註冊截止日期，那麼你將無法參與這次的活動。請留意我們的網站以確認下次活動的訊息。
FAQ.q7: Q7: 我在哪裡可以找到所有在 Taiwan Builder House 活動中建立的專案?
FAQ.a7: A7: 你可以在我們的網站上找到所有在我們活動中建立的專案。
FAQ.q8: Q8: Taiwan Builder House 會提供旅行補助嗎?
FAQ.a8: A8: 抱歉，我們目前並不提供旅行補助。但請留意，我們的活動有線上和線下兩種形式，你可以選擇最適合你的方式參加。
FAQ.q9: Q9: 我可以作為參觀者參加活動嗎?
FAQ.a9: A9: 當然，我們歡迎任何人以參觀者的身份參加活動。
FAQ.q10: Q10: 我如何才能讓 Taiwan Builder House 在我所在的城市舉辦黑客松?
FAQ.a10: A10: 你可以透過我們的聯絡方式將你的建議傳達給我們，我們會考慮所有的提議。
FAQ.q11: Q11: 我該如何與 Taiwan Builder House 合作或協作?
FAQ.a11: A11: 如果你有任何想要合作或協作的想法，請透過我們的聯絡方式與我們取得聯繫。
FAQ.q12: Q12: 我可以在活動開始前就開始製作我的專案嗎？報名的資格是什麼？
FAQ.a12: A12: 只要你的項目未完成「種子輪」融資，皆可進行報名。你將可以在活動開始之前就開發產品，我們更在意項目的完整以及發展潛力。
FAQ.q13: Q13: 我可以遠程參加這個活動嗎?
FAQ.a13: A13: 是的，你可以選擇遠程參加先期的活動，但 12/17 當天需要到達會場。
FAQ.q14: Q14: 如果我沒有看到我心儀的題目該怎麼辦?
FAQ.a14: A14: 若導師的題目無法引起你的興趣，你依然可以報名 TBH 爭取大會獎金，但將無法獲得導師提供的獎金機會。
FAQ.q15: Q15: 一個團隊或者開發者能報名幾個項目?
FAQ.a15: A15: TBH 並沒有針對報名數量有限制，歡迎同時參與數個導師出的題目，進而爭取更多獎金。
FAQ.q16: Q16: 我最多可以獲得幾個獎項?
FAQ.a16: A16: 除了大會的Best Overall 和 Most Potential 兩個獎項只能二擇一之外，其餘獎項以及獎金只要符合資格，將可累加獲得。
FAQ.q17: Q17: 可以的，只要你的項目未完成種子輪融資，並且已經成熟到足以開放給 Hunter 參與，那我們歡迎一起成為寶石。
FAQ.a17: A17: 你可以使用任何你想要的硬體，但是我們建議你使用開源硬體，因為這樣可以讓更多人了解你的專案。
FAQ.q18: Q18: 我可以在活動中使用哪些資料?
FAQ.a18: A18: 如果你晚於8/25提交項目，那很抱歉我們將無法受理你的報名。但越早繳交你的專案，將有機會越早接受導師的幫助。
FAQ.q19: Q19: 我該如何從我的團隊中移除某個人？
FAQ.a19: A19: 如果你想從你的團隊中移除某個人，你可以聯繫我們的工作人員協助你進行。
FAQ.q20: Q20: 我可以在專案創建後，編輯我的專案名稱、描述等資訊嗎?
FAQ.a20: A20: 是的，你可以在專案創建後，隨時編輯你的專案名稱、描述等資訊。

home.content1: Nero is a modular blockchain focused on enhancing user experience, ecosystem economics, and validator stability. We examines Nero’s three-layer architecture and key features such as user-centric design, sustainable tokenomics, and streamlined onboarding. The aim is to demonstrate how Nero effectively addresses the challenges faced by applications and users in the blockchain space, offering an efficient and secure infrastructure.
home.content2: Nero’s three layer, EVM compatible modular blockchain architecture allows for a more efficient and scalable system by offloading work to other specialized modular blockchains.
home.content3:
CYOG: CHOOSE YOUR OWN GAS.
Nero enables gas fees to be paid in platform tokens, fostering a more sustainable and stable ecosystem by creating a demand force.
home.title4:
SPONSORED
GAS FEES
FOR NEW USERS
home.content4: To encourage user adoption and remove barriers to entry, Nero leverages the Paymaster mechanism in account abstraction to sponsor the gas fees for the first few transactions made by new users, allowing them to explore the platform without incurring initial costs. Furthermore, new projects can also sponsor others’ transaction fees in exchange for increased exposure.
home.content5:
Nero’s integration with account abstraction enables users to log in using their existing social accounts, streamlining the onboarding process and removing the need to create a separate blockchain-specific account.
 
No plugin or extension wallets need to be installed.
home.content6: Nero places a strong emphasis on delivering clear and understandable transaction messages for its users. The platform becomes more accessible to those without a deep technical understanding of blockchain technology. Providing more comprehensible transaction messages helps users identify and prevent potential scams by providing greater transparency in transaction details.

main.subTitle: The Odyssey
main.content: Taiwan Builder House (TBH) is an innovative community that gathers various Web3 elements. Over here, you not only can connect with diverse developers and talented traders but also are able to find like-minded partners. Through TBH, you'll have an opportunity to expand your horizon in Web3 space

timeLine.content1:
Please complete the TBH registration form and use the invitation in the confirmation email to join the TBH workspace for competition coordination, communication, and updates.

Participants can register either as a project or as individuals seeking a project team, but only projects are eligible to be listed as finalist teams.

Individuals seeking a team can update their existing registration or create a new team registration once they form or join a team. Choose your preferred topic and submit the initial proposal by December 8th, following the specified requirements. Proposal formats can include Deck, Prototype, or MVP.
timeLine.content2:
Teams that choose a topic will have the opportunity for more comprehensive mentorship with topic proposers.

However, if you do not prefer a mentor's challenge, you can still submit directly and book for mentorship with us.

TBH's judging panel will select from the registered projects based on the predetermined evaluation criteria.

We will assess your project based on multiple criteria, including concept, technical implementation, product design, innovative use cases, etc...
timeLine.content3:
Finalist teams are required to participate in TBH's Presentation Day in person.

Each team will have 10 - 15 minutes to give their presentation.

Teams can allocate the time as they see fit, but we recommend that each team reserve five minutes for questions from the judging panel.

The results will be announced on the same day as the online and in-person presentation sessions conclude.

overView.title: OVERVIEW
overView.content1: Demonstrate your technical skill and innovative thinking by submitting exceptional projects. Suppose your project receives positive feedback during the event and is deemed promising. In that case, Hackers can secure prizes and incubation opportunities to develop further and enhance the projects.
overView.subTitle1: Submit your projects to showcase your technical skills and innovative thinking, aiming to attract VC funding and mentorship.
overView.F1-1: Participating projects have not completed Seed Round financing.
overView.F1-2: Hackers need to form or join a team on their own to participate.
overView.F1-3: Hackers must join the Telegram group to receive the latest updates.
overView.F2-1: Hackers can start development after the event begins but must submit their work by 8/25 at the latest.
overView.F2-2: Choosing a topic and submitting a proposal earlier provides a better opportunity for interaction with mentors. Submissions after the competition period will not be accepted.
overView.F2-3: Hackers can use any open-source code or publicly available APIs but must explicitly list all external resources and explain their usage when submitting their work.
overView.F2-4: Projects must be original and not copied from others.
overView.F3-1: Innovativeness : If the project demonstrates innovative thinking and novel problem-solving approaches.
overView.F3-2: Technical Implementation : The technical completeness and complexity of the work.
overView.F3-3: Practicality : If the project address real-world problems or possess practical value and potential for actual product or service transformation.
overView.F3-4: User Experience : The design and user experience aspects of the work.
overView.F4-1: Hackers should prioritize selecting Bounty topics to access Bounty rewards and Mentor resources. The submitted project will automatically enter the live evaluation phase if it does not relate to any provided topics.
overView.F4-2: Hackers must submit their works within the specified time frame; submissions must be on time to be accepted.
overView.F4-3: Work submissions must include complete source code, usage instructions, and a brief development report explaining how the work solves the problem and its innovative points.
overView.F5-1: The copyright of the participating works belongs to the developers, but TBH has the right to share and showcase these works for non-commercial purposes and quote these works in event promotions.
overView.F5-2: If any submission involves copyright infringement, the responsibility falls on the developers.
overView.content2: Traders include but are not limited to trading tools, quantitative strategies, or high-frequency strategies. TBH will provide opportunities such as trading competitions, quantitative trading workshops, and trading-related topics. If a Trader's strategy has implementation value, participants can earn prizes and gain more collaboration opportunities.
overView.subTitle2: Develop excellent strategies, unlock trading potential, and seize substantial rewards and collaboration opportunities.
overView.S1-1: Traders need to have a basic understanding of financial markets and trading strategies.
overView.S1-2: Traders can participate as individuals or in a team.
overView.S2-1: Traders can start developing trading strategies after the event begins but must submit complete strategies and backtesting results by 8/25. Please ensure all strategies and results are presented for the judges' evaluation.
overView.S2-2: Participants can use any open-source code or publicly available APIs but must explicitly list all external resources and explain their usage when submitting their work.
overView.S2-3: Participants can use any open-source code or publicly available financial data APIs.
overView.S3-1: Strategy Innovation : Does the strategy exhibit innovative ideas and methods ?
overView.S3-2: Risk Management : Has this strategy considered risk control and the ability to withstand market fluctuations ?
overView.S4-1: Traders must submit their strategies within the specified time frame; submissions must be on time to be accepted.
overView.S4-2: Strategy submissions must include strategy explanations and detailed backtesting reports.
overView.content3: Gem Hunters represent the communities; participants must complete challenges and tasks by seeking and collecting "gems" (clues, NFTs, or other symbolic items within the event). Hunters can earn special privileges from the conference by gathering a certain number of gems.
overView.subTitle3: Complete tasks, collect gems, exchange for NFTs, and redeem Taiwan Builder House's benefit.
overView.T1-1: Hunters must register and join the Gem Hunter Group before the event begins.
overView.T1-2: Hunters must provide the required wallet address.
overView.T2-1: Completion of 20% collection progress : TBH2023 SilveryNFT, Silvery Prize.
overView.T2-2: Completion of 50% collection progress : TBH2023 GoldenNFT, Golden Prize.
overView.T2-3: Completion of 100% collection progress : Gain After Party ticket, TBH2023 DiamondNFT, Diamond Prize.
overView.T3-1: Hunters must adhere to the event rules and collect gems according to specified challenges and tasks.
overView.T3-2: The quantity of gems earned from completing tasks varies based on task difficulty and requirements.
overView.T3-3: Any attempt at cheating or violating the rules will result in the organizers canceling all privileges for that participant and removing them from the Gem Hunter Group.
overView.T3-4: Hunters must use the same address for tasks. An incorrect address will be considered incomplete.
overView.T3-5: TBH will not provide any alternative compensation if a Hunter cannot attend and cannot obtain partial privileges.
overView.T4-1: Event dates, tasks, and prize content may be subject to change; please closely follow announcements from the Gem Hunter Group.
overView.T4-2: Hunters must ensure accurate contact information; if incorrect contact information results in the inability to receive partial benefits, TBH will not provide alternative compensation.
overView.T4-3: Any attempt at cheating or violating the rules will result in the organizers canceling all privileges for that participant and removing them from the Gem Hunter Group.

prize.title: Prize
prize.pf: First Prize : 3,000U, Onekey mini * 1, $1000 Google Cloud Credit + Technical mentorship
prize.ps: Second Prize : 2,000U, $1000 Google Cloud Credit + Technical mentorship
prize.pt: Third Prize : 1,000U, $1000 Google Cloud Credit + Technical mentorship
prize.pf1: First Prize : 1,500U, Onekey mini * 1, $500 Google Cloud Credit + Technical mentorship
prize.ps1: Second Prize : 1,000U, $500 Google Cloud Credit + Technical mentorship
prize.pt1: Third Prize : 500U, $500 Google Cloud Credit + Technical mentorship
prize.1T: Judges will select the overall best projects.
prize.1S: Only one project can win the Overall Best Award
prize.2T: Judges will select projects with the most potential.
prize.2S: Only one project can win the Most Potential Project Award.
prize.3T: Project with the most votes from the communities.
prize.TZ: 1. Integrate blockchain with AI. There is no limitation.
prize.LCC: 'Volatility' is a critical factor in financial markets, creating opportunities for arbitrage and attracting risk-takers. In comparison to traditional finance, the cryptocurrency market possesses the characteristic of high volatility and risk. Despite this, the high returns associated with increased risks continue to attract numerous traders to trade within the market.
prize.LC1T: 1. Predict Market Trends by Analyzing Volatility. Predict market trends by analyzing volatility using any method of your choice.
prize.LC1C1: If using 'time' as the sampling criterion, predict the market state 3000ms later.
prize.LC1C2: If using 'trades' as the sampling criterion, indicate the market state 300 ticks later.
prize.LC1C3: Accuracy will be the scoring criteria.
prize.LC2T: 2. Develop a Trading Model based on Analysis Construct a trading model based on your analysis results, considering factors like transaction fees, slippage, and execution outcomes during backtesting.
prize.Bonki: $BONK is a culture token for a cryptocurrency that combines web3 humor with functionality. It partners with DeFi, gaming, and NFT projects across multiple chains, with 130+ integrations and trading on 50+ global exchanges.
prize.Bonkt1: Create a Gacha Machine mechanism that allows users to spend a certain amount of input currency (Solana tokens or NFTs) to receive rewards in a probabilistic manner.
prize.WHT: Innovative Development Contest Using Wormhole for Cross-Chain Functionality
prize.WHC: The prize distribution will be based on the innovation, practicality, user experience, and technical implementation presented by the participating teams. A panel of expert judges will determine winners for each prize tier.
prize.WH1T: 1. The project must utilize Wormhole SDK to achieve cross-chain functionality and operate across multiple blockchain ecosystems.
prize.WH2T: 2. The project can be in DeFi, NFTs, gaming, or other fields, but it must possess practical utility and potential market value.
prize.WH3T: 3. The design and implementation of the project must be outstanding, encompassing user experience, performance, and security, among others.
prize.WH4T: 4. The project should come with comprehensive documentation and well-commented code to facilitate evaluation by judges and community members.
prize.WHS: Wormhole community and developers website: https://wormhole.com/community
prize.FCT: Create innovative decentralized projects using Filecoin and IPFS, domains can vary among media sharing, social media, decentralized finance (DeFi), etc…
prize.FCC: The prize distribution will be based on the innovation, practicality, user experience, and technical implementation presented by the participating teams. Winners for each prize tier will be determined by a panel of expert judges.
prize.FC1T: 1. The project must be entirely new and not a simple modification or enhancement of existing applications.
prize.FC2T: 2. It must have practical utility and value, and be able to explain how it addresses a specific problem.
prize.FC3T: 3. The design and implementation of the project must be excellent, encompassing aspects such as user experience, performance, and security.
prize.FC4T: 4. Submitted projects must be open-source with licenses under MIT and APACHE2.
prize.FC5T: 4. The technical implementation of the product must be robust and a working prototype or demo should be showcased during the TBH.
prize.FCS:
Filecoin Official Documentation and Developer Tools: https://docs.filecoin.io/
Filecoin Grants Proposal Template and Guide: https://github.com/filecoin-project/devgrants
Filecoin Community and Developer Forums: https://docs.filecoin.io/basics/project-and-community/chat-and-discussion-forums/
Filecoin Dev Grants GitHub Repository: https://github.com/filecoin-project/devgrants
IPFS Official Documentation: https://docs.ipfs.io/

When making a proposal, you should include the following information : 
Project Name : The name of your project or proposal.
Project Description : A brief overview of what your project is, what it does, and why it's important.
Team Information : Information about you and your team members, including your skills and experience, and why you are suitable to execute this project.
Detailed Design : A detailed plan on how you intend to implement your project, including technical details and the tools you plan to use.
Timeline : The timeframe within which you plan to complete the project, including any significant milestones.
Budget and Fund Usage : How much funding you need and how you intend to allocate these funds.
License : The open-source license under which your project will be released.
Support and Participation : How you plan to involve the community in your project and how you intend to support and maintain it.
Additional Information : Any other information you believe the judging panel needs to know.
This comprehensive proposal will provide evaluators with a clear understanding of your project's goals, execution plan, and potential impact.
prize.HVT: Build innovative features around the "Fat Protocol"
prize.HVC: "Fat Protocol Thesis" proposed by Joel Monegro in 2016, states that the value of the underlying blockchain protocol is always greater than the value of the applications built on top of it. Essentially, the market cap of the foundational layer will always exceed the combined market cap of all applications built on that same foundational layer.
prize.HV1T: Please utilize the composability features of top protocols to build innovative functionalities around the "Fat Protocol" concept. For instance, leverage Uniswap's hook mechanism to trigger programmability in transactions, fostering research and development within the Uniswap ecosystem. The greatest benefits are derived from its robust depth of liquidity.
prize.CTT: What will social interaction look like in the Web3 world? Unleash your creativity and submit an intriguing Web3 Social Idea!
prize.CTC: Design an Innovative and Engaging Web3 Social Application: Demonstrating user interaction through Web3 technologies (Wallet Logins, Decentralized Anonymity, Incentive Mechanisms, etc.), and ensuring sustained user engagement.
prize.CT1C1: Implement platform operation and incentive mechanisms using Web3 technologies.
prize.CT1C2: Provide effective incentive methods to attract user participation.
prize.CT1C3: Design verification mechanisms to ensure authenticity of incentives and user interactions.
prize.CT1C4: Demonstrating the social application scenario is best presented through a concept or demo.
prize.CT2C1: Innovation and technical feasibility of the solution.
prize.CT2C4: Consideration of user stickiness and engagement.
prize.ACEC: During the specified period, upon application and approval, participants will be eligible for the Maker rebate.
prize.ACE1T: During the period : When Maker trading volume reaches 10,000,000 TWD
prize.ACE1C1: The Maker fee will be reduced by 0.02%.
prize.ACE2T: During the period : When Maker trading volume reaches 20,000,000 TWD,
prize.ACE2C1: The Maker fee will be reduced by 0.03%.
prize.ACE3C1: Trading volume is calculated only for TWD trading pairs in the form of Maker.
prize.ACE3C2: Fee refunds will be processed on a weekly basis.
prize.ACE3C3: Taker fees will be calculated according to the original fee structure.

FAQ.title: FAQ
FAQ.q1: Q1: What is Taiwan Builder House?
FAQ.a1: A1: We are dedicated to bringing together Taiwan's communities and providing a platform for developers and communities to showcase their talents.
FAQ.q2: Q2: Who can participate in this event?
FAQ.a2: A2: Anyone can participate, whether you are a beginner or an experienced developer, or even a community participant.
FAQ.q3: Q3: How much does it cost to participate in the event?
FAQ.a3: A3: Participation in the event is entirely free. We welcome everyone to join. Participants will automatically become Hunters and compete for substantial rewards!
FAQ.q4: Q4: I'm a coding newbie. Can I participate?
FAQ.a4: A4: Absolutely! We encourage everyone interested to participate in this event.
FAQ.a5: A5: Early registration means you can complete your registration before the event starts. This way, you'll receive updates and information earlier. Please note that there are different registration links for Developers/Traders and the Community (Hunters).
FAQ.q6: Q6: Can I apply if I missed the registration deadline?
FAQ.a6: A6: You must complete the registration deadline to be able to participate in this event. Keep an eye on our website for information about future events.
FAQ.q7: Q7: Where can I find all the projects during the Taiwan Builder House events?
FAQ.a7: A7: You can find all the projects created during our events on our website.
FAQ.q8: Q8: Does Taiwan Builder House provide travel grants?
FAQ.a8: A8: We're sorry, but currently, we don't provide travel grants. However, please note that our events have online and offline formats, so you can choose the most suitable way to participate.
FAQ.q9: Q9: Can I participate in the event as an observer?
FAQ.a9: A9: Certainly, we welcome anyone to participate in the event.
FAQ.q10: Q10: How can I suggest hosting a Taiwan Builder House hackathon in my city?
FAQ.a10: A10: Please share your ideas at [contacts@builderdao.co](mailto:contacts@builderdao.co) , and we'll review all submissions.
FAQ.q11: Q11: How can I partner with Taiwan Builder House?
FAQ.a11: A11: If you're interested in partnering with us, please reach out to [contacts@builderdao.co](mailto:contacts@builderdao.co).
FAQ.q12: Q12: Can I begin my project before the event kicks off? What are the criteria for registration?
FAQ.a12: A12: You can register if your project hasn't secured "Seed Round" funding. You can commence your project before the event. We prioritize project potential and completion.
FAQ.q13: Q13: Is remote participation in the event possible?
FAQ.a13: A13: You can participate remotely in the preliminary stages but must be on-site on 12/17.
FAQ.q14: Q14: What if none of the topics appeal to me?
FAQ.a14: A14: If our mentor topics don't resonate, you can still register for TBH to vie for the conference prize, but mentor-specific prizes won't be available.
FAQ.q15: Q15: How many projects can a team or individual developer sign up for?
FAQ.a15: A15: TBH doesn't cap registrations. Feel free to engage in multiple mentor topics to vie for more prizes.
FAQ.q16: Q16: What's the maximum number of awards I can win?
FAQ.a16: A16: Apart from the "Best Overall" and "Most Potential" conference awards (of which you can only pick one), you can accumulate other prizes if you meet the criteria.
FAQ.q17: Q17: Can my TBH contestant project also attract Gem Hunters as a Gem?
FAQ.a17: A17: Absolutely! If your project hasn't secured Seed Round funding and is ready for Hunter engagement, we'd love for it to be a Gem.
FAQ.q18: Q18: What if I need to submit my project details early?
FAQ.a18: A18: Submissions post 8/25 won't be processed. However, early submissions might get you mentor support sooner.
FAQ.q19: Q19: How do I remove a team member?
FAQ.a19: A19: To remove a team member, please contact our team at [contact@builderdao.co](mailto:contact@builderdao.co).
FAQ.q20: Q20: Can I modify my project's name, description, and other details post-creation?
FAQ.a20: A20: Yes, you can update your project's name, description, and further details after its creation.
